title: Keith Rabois Bets on Legal AI Tech With Startup Spellbook
description: Artificial intelligence startup Spellbook raised $50 million in a funding round led by Khosla Ventures managing partner Keith Rabois — making the firm the latest venture player to bankroll AI companies tackling the legal industry.

title: Cisco Launches 8223 Routing System to Connect AI Data Centres
description: Cisco has launched the 8223 routing system, designed to connect data centres for distributed artificial intelligence (AI) workloads. The system, powered by Cisco’s new Silicon One P200 chip, provides 51.2 terabits per second (Tbps) of Ethernet routing capacity, the company said.

title: Razorpay, NPCI, OpenAI Partner To Launch AI-Driven Payments Through ChatGPT
description:
Razorpay, the National Payments Corp. and OpenAI have joined hands to roll out 'Agentic Payments'. The feature will allow users to make digital transactions via ChatGPT. The pilot project will try to combine artificial intelligence and the Unified Payments Interface.
The project aims to incorporate AI into regular operations. People will be able to check, add and buy products within the ChatGPT interface.
content:

title: Graphcore Expands with New AI Engineering Campus in Bengaluru
description: Graphcore, a subsidiary of SoftBank Group, is opening a new AI Engineering Campus in Bengaluru, creating 500 semiconductor jobs with a £1bn investment over the next decade. This initiative aligns with SoftBank's vision to lead in the Artificial Super Intelligence space.
content: Graphcore, a SoftBank Group subsidiary, is launching a state-of-the-art AI Engineering Campus in Bengaluru, India, an initiative promising to generate 500 new jobs in the semiconductor industry. With plans to invest up to £1 billion over the next ten... [709 chars]

description: Artificial intelligence endangers democracy – but it’s less about specific deepfakes and more about a bigger transformation
content:

title: Pope Leo urges news outlets not to 'sell out' for click-bait

content:
